message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value, I propose a price of $95 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $85.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. I would like to counter your offer at $90 for the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $87.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $89 for the product.
